title: This free GP skin is a joke
body:
So I own gangplank and play him occasionally for fun. I saw he got his rework and tried him out a few times in custom games to see what he's like, I was satisfied and didn't play him after that.

Now Riot announces that everyone who plays GP **IN A MATCHMADE QUE** during the event gets a free skin... _after disabling him_.

So I don't get the free skin now because I can't play GP. Nice one Riot.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Gangplank will be enabled before the event ends on August 10th, so you'll still have time to earn your skin! :D Also, if you played him at the beginning of the event before his was disabled, in a match made queue, you've already earned the skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=2EEGGIEV,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-03T05:26:05.156+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Gangplank will be enabled before the event ends on August 10th, so you'll still have time to earn your skin! :D Also, if you played him at the beginning of the event before his was disabled, in a match made queue, you've already earned the skin.

Does co-op count?

http://www.auplod.com/u/daopul5c344.png
[Yup](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3fivww/gangplank_returns_and_the_event_end_draws_near/ctp3fa2)! As long as it's a matchmade queue - so not customs.
So really any match that isn't a custom? Sweet. Already done.
Yup!
Um, the patch is out, but Captain Gangplank is "unavailable". Does that mean I have to play him again, or is this a bug?
Captain Gangplank will be handed out at the end of the event. :]
Then how do you know if you got it?
As long as you own Gangplank by the end of the event on August 10th, and you've played one matchmade game with him (no customs), you'll receive the skin.
Sorry if I sound repetitive. Do I have to play another matchmade game with him, in this new Patch of 5.15 (which I haven't done yet), or am I good to go?
No, one game during the course of the event. If you played in 5.14, you're good.

Hey Katey, I'm assuming that the captain skin gets the first updated VO that he had right when the rework dropped, right? I noticed that when the bases were changed, his skins like minuteman and sultan got the new base's VO and it noticeably does not fit. Would it be possible to get the captain VO on these skins? It fit really well before he was disabled, but now the visual and audio themes are clashing heavily and it doesn't need to.
Champion Updated handled this one, as opposed to skins. I don't believe the have plans to change it back.

Hey Katey,

kinda off topic but....
I like this new look for GP (referring to the new default) but his in game visual is kinda funny the way his beard curls up. The older versions the beard curl thing worked for the model. But its kinda funny looking on this visual. any way you could put that feedback in the appropriate place?
As long as you own Gangplank before the event ends, ARAM totally counts!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=2EEGGIEV,comment-id=00020000000000030001,timestamp=2015-08-03T18:30:56.167+0000)
>
> As long as you own Gangplank before the event ends, ARAM totally counts!

Katey since I know you're in relations with the skins department can I suggest something for captain GP, I'd actually appreciate it if your champion portrait in the ingame HUD when in using this skin was captain Gangplank's still instead of the new gangplank splash. Similar to the cases with spirit guard udyr and pulsefire ezreal.
This is something we do for ultimate skins - but not something we plan to do for other types of skins at this time.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=2EEGGIEV,comment-id=0002000000000003000100000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T20:08:45.281+0000)
>
> This is something we do for ultimate skins - but not something we plan to do for other types of skins at this time.

Fair enough.
if you own gp yes, if you dont own gangplank no.

You don't need to own GP initially - as long as you own him before the event ends on August 10th, you'll receive the Gangplank skin. If you played him F2P before he was disabled, as long as it's not a custom game, you're eligible to receive Captain Gangplank.

Did you have to own him beforehand?

Like, I played him during his free week. So if I bought him as soon as he's enabled, would I be eligible for the skin or would I need to play a game anyway?

Nope! You don't have to own him beforehand. You can play him F2P, and as long as you own him before the event ends, you **will** receive the Captain Gangplank skin. Just make sure the game you played wasn't a custom. :]
If you played a game as him post rework before owning him but you own him before the 10th you should get it, at least that is what jareden said.
It was answered in the main post, but as long as you own Gangplank and have played a matchmade game by the 10th, in any order, you get it.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=2EEGGIEV,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2015-08-03T05:45:01.434+0000)
>
> [Yup](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3fivww/gangplank_returns_and_the_event_end_draws_near/ctp3fa2)! As long as it's a matchmade queue - so not customs.

Thank you!

http://www.auplod.com/u/daopul5c344.png
Do you play rs luck?
i played gangplank yestoday night and didn't get the skin :({{champion:41}}

You won't receive it instantly. We'll be handing them out after the event.

EDIT: It'll take about 3 days for everything to be handed out!
Just got mine this morning. Ty guys for this event.
Glad you liked it! :D
Going to miss the brawler minions though....maybe next time they come they can pool party with the minions? XD
Am I right to assume that the free skin for mystery purchase will be handed after all the gp skin thing is over?
For the Mystery Skin, buy six get one free? They'll be handed out within a week of the event ending.
It's not the 10th yet.
Reading is hard. He'll be back online before the event ends. Also, since you already played him post rework you're already getting the skin.

I didn't read anything. I was just going from what other people told me. It's good to know that I'm not going to miss out on the skin.

You're wrong about me already qualifying for the skin though, I still need to play him in normals because custom games aren't considered matchmade ques.
I can understand why my opening post got downvoted, but why this one?

> [{quoted}](name=Laraso,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=2EEGGIEV,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-08-03T05:12:16.137+0000)
>
> I didn't read anything. I was just going from what other people told me.

Probably because of that in conjunction with this thread.
Cause you stated you didn't read anything and thus got mad for no reason.
He said he played him in some customs, and those won't count. He'll have to play after they enable him.
He's going to be enabled with the patch and you'll have plenty of time to play him before the event ends.
And then everyone bans GP T_T
Reported for banning GP

Seeing as vs ai can get you the skin I'm a little bit at ease about this. I haven't played GP in a long time and wouldn't want to risk playing against other people. Plus it would be easier to get him that way than playin with other people who will just instalock.
it counts in co-op vs ai
gonna have to wait, young one
He's available now

I ply gp in normal and win game with gp (after update)

but i dont get free skin YET

HOw i can get this skin ?

help pls
